about_the_game:
E-Lich: Corporate Souls is an action roguelite bullet heaven game featuring a comedic narrative, over 100 boons that allow you to reach game-breaking power-levels, lots of build options that guarantee hours of replayability, and hundreds of awful office jokes and funny references.

If you have any feedback or bugs to report, or just want to have good time and check out some sneak peaks of our team's WIP work, join E-Lich Corp's Discord server by clicking in the animated banner above!

Features

  • Enjoy chaotic roguelite action with dozens of options to choose from when you level up

  • Achieve game-breaking levels of power

  • Unlock permanent upgrades as your company grows

  • Enjoy a comedic narrative with a unique cast of characters

  • Explore an interactive office that improves according to your progress

Company Benefits

  • Experience what it's like to work for the largest company in town (not at all due to the fact that it razed that town in order to build its HQ).

  • Get excited to be part of its unstoppable growth (especially when your competitors ask you to stop)!

  • Look forward to meeting all sorts of fun and loyal coworkers that will instantly want to bond with you (by making you work in their stead).

  • Develop a great sense of ownership by taking part in a fundamental and decision-making-heavy role in the company as The Intern.

Certified as the GPTWF (Greatest Place To Work Forever), E-Lich Corp makes it their mission to make sure you will never want leave. And trust us when we say you won't. Ever.

You'll play as The Intern, E-Lich Corp's newest, creative and bold hire. Learn more about this not-so-evil company's surreal workplace, unrealistic goals and unique employees as you interact with the various characters on company grounds. Look forward to your next adventure! (And maybe backwards too. You can never be too careful...)

content_descriptors.notes: The game may contain mild displays of violence, strong language and adult themes.

  • Graphics: GTX 1080 / RX 5700XT

short_description: There’s no R.I.P at E-Lich Corp! Explore the afterlife in this roguelite bullet heaven that is all about humor, insane power-levels, replayability and awful office jokes. Reap souls along your undead coworkers in a company that values your life. And death. Literally.
